title: Noam Chomsky on The New World Order (1998)
description:
Professor Chomsky talked about how academics and journalists helped shape foreign policy and build a new world order in the late 20th century. He was critical of the U.S. and Great Britainâ€™s use of state capitalism to build and maintain power. After his comments he answered questions from the audience.
